channel.title: Server Bush Security on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Bush Security on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Agent orange
item.description: so I have been thinking up this journal entry for a couple days. I entered it yesterday - but I reboot my server and then was like.. hey I will press submit and lost it in the resulting downtime.. ugh.anyway.. I have a theory. it is this: so bush declared terror level orange and now their are security dogs on the blue line at all times. I think the two are related.
